result.execSummary:
The defendant Joshua Austin Sparrow was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Joshua Austin Sparrow is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Joshua Austin Sparrow was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Joshua Austin Sparrow was found guilty of Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $50 per month payment plan commencing by March 5, 2015.
If after 12 months the defendant has paid the fine & costs in full and has had no criminal violations the defendant may petition the Court for Expungement under 973.015

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Joshua Austin Sparrow in court.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
14TR1858 tracking with.
  Atty Hendee states plea agreement to Counts 1 & 2.  Count 3 along with 14TR1858 to be dismissed.  Atty Hendee has no objection to expungment with conditions.  Court questions the defendant.  Defendant agrees.    Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.  Defendant waives their right to an attorney.  Court accepts defendant's waiver of Attorney.
Defendant enters a Guilty plea.
  Court questions defendant regarding plea. Advises of Constitutional Rights and elements of the charge.  Court finds plea made knowingly, voluntarily & Intelligently.

  BY THE COURT:  Court finds a sufficient factual basis to support the charges.  Court accepts defendant's plea and finds defendant guilty of Counts 1 & 2.  Count 3 along with 14TR1858 to be dismissed.

Defendant makes a statement to the court.

BY THE COURT:  Ct. 1:  Pay fine and costs = $442.00
Ct. 2:  Court Costs = $243.00  
Payment Plan:  $50.00/month commencing in March.
If after 12 months the defendant has paid the fine and costs in full and has had no criminal violations, the defendant may petition the court for Expungement 973.015.

Ct. 3 to be dismissed.
14TR1858 to be dismissed.
15CM5 and 14TR1799 are tracking together per DA's Office.
Return date on February 5, 2015 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Joshua Austin Sparrow in court.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Hendee states that bond needs to be set along with booking.    Defendant received a copy of the criminal complaint & waives it's reading.  Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.
  Atty Hendee has no objection to a signature bond with conditions.
BY THE COURT:  Court sets a $500 Signature bond with conditions:
*Appear for booking today

Court enters a Not Guilty plea on behalf of the defendant.  Court questions the defendant.    Defendant waives their right to an attorney in order to have a conference with the District Attorney.  Court accepts defendant's waiver of Attorney.

BY THE COURT:  Set for Return.
  Return date scheduled for February 5, 2015 at 03:30 pm.
